price: (84) Say, [O Muḥammad], "To whom belongs the earth and whoever is in it, if you should know?"
arabic: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul limani al-arḍu waman fīhā in kuntum taʿlamūna
